CTA_SECTION.TITLE: Ready to Experience the Magic?
CTA_SECTION.SUBTITLE: Join thousands of movie lovers and discover the best cinematic experiences. Book your tickets now and enjoy exclusive benefits!

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Get in Touch
CONTACT_US.SUBTITLE: We'd love to hear from you. Contact us for any questions, feedback, or support.

STORY.TITLE: Our Story
STORY.DESCRIPTION: Founded with a passion for bringing the magic of cinema to our community, CineScreen has been the premier destination for movie lovers since our opening. We believe in creating unforgettable experiences that transport audiences to new worlds.

OFFERINGS.TITLE: What We Offer
OFFERINGS.DESCRIPTION: From the latest blockbusters to timeless classics, we showcase a diverse selection of films in state-of-the-art theaters. Our premium sound systems and comfortable seating ensure every visit is exceptional.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.DESCRIPTION: To provide an exceptional cinematic experience that brings people together through the power of storytelling. We strive to be more than just a cinema - we're a community hub for entertainment and culture.

WHY_CHOOSE.TITLE: Why Choose CineScreen
WHY_CHOOSE.DESCRIPTION: Experience the difference with our commitment to quality, comfort, and customer satisfaction. From our friendly staff to our modern facilities, every detail is designed to enhance your movie-going experience.

MAP.TITLE: Find Us
MAP.DESCRIPTION: Visit us at our cinema location in Mostar

SOCIAL_MEDIA.TITLE: Follow Us
SOCIAL_MEDIA.DESCRIPTION: Stay connected with us on social media for the latest updates, special offers, and behind-the-scenes content.

RESERVATIONS.TITLE: My Reservations
RESERVATIONS.SUBTITLE: Review all your food and movie reservations
